channel.title: News on Ubucon Europe 2022
channel.description: Recent content in News on Ubucon Europe 2022

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2022 - Looking for volunteers!
item.description: Hello everyone! After a successful Ubucon Europe in 2019, we have been lacking in organizing another one. This is mostly due to the taxing of the pandemic, on which we were waiting to see if we could at some point do an in-person event. At the pace of how things are developing in the world, right now, an in-person event doesnâ€™t seem a viable thing to do without major risks and hassles, hence we decided to do it online.
